# Institution Logos

Place institution logo files in this directory with the following naming convention:

## Naming Convention
- `cornell-university.png` - Cornell University logo
- `mit.png` - MIT logo
- etc.

## File Requirements
- **Format**: PNG or SVG preferred
- **Size**: Recommended 200x100 pixels (or proportional)
- **Background**: Transparent preferred
- **Quality**: High resolution for crisp display

## Usage
The website will automatically detect and display logos based on the institution names in the team data.

## Current Institutions Needed
- Cornell University (`cornell-university.png`)
- Add more as team expands...
